definition: to have a mind to/to intend to/deliberately/considerate
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
resolute person/person with aspirations/people who feel/people who use their heads
there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome
pinyin: shi4 shang4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
containing_words.word: 世上無難事，只怕有心人

definition: lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
containing_words.word: 天下無難事，只怕有心人

definition: lit. the fairy is willing, but King Xiang doesn't dream (idiom)/(said of a woman's unrequited love)
pinyin: shen2 nu:3 you3 xin1 , Xiang1 Wang2 wu2 meng4

definition: to take a casual remark to heart (idiom)
pinyin: yan2 zhe3 wu2 yi4 , ting1 zhe3 you3 xin1

sentences.english: He is a cheeper apparently, I make him purposely happy, exert all over skill.
sentences.chinese: 他明顯是個雛，我有心讓他快樂，使出了渾身解數。

sentences.english: But sincere or insincere, the intentions of persons are not here under question.
sentences.chinese: 但不管是真誠還是虛僞，有心人不必在兒這盤根究底。

sentences.english: Got your mind set on a dream.
sentences.chinese: 夢想可成真，只怕有心人。

sentences.english: In this paper it is shown that there are two vector constants of the motion for a charged particle in the central field of force.
sentences.chinese: 證明了帶電粒子在有心力場中運動時有兩個守恆矢量。

sentences.english: The Federal Reserve is trying new ways of support, somewhat halfheartedly.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲正在嘗試新的改進措施，有點有心無力。

sentences.english: Many a strong man has weakened before such a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣一個挑戰中，很多勇者都有心無力。

sentences.english: Where there is, as long as caring people.
sentences.chinese: 天下無難事，只要有心人。

sentences.english: A good man has a heart.
sentences.chinese: 總之，好男人是一位有心人。

sentences.english: People can paste transparent rubberized fabric along the edges to reinforce the bag if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 有心的話還可以在邊緣貼透明膠布起加固作用。

sentences.english: Nothing in the world is difficult for one who sets his mind on it.
sentences.chinese: 世上無難事，只怕有心人。

sentences.english: The Chinese people believe there is nothing in the world that cannot be done for those who are really resolved.
sentences.chinese: 中國人相信“世上無難事，只怕有心人”。

sentences.english: I am a man of heart.
I will send you a copy in case you care to read it .
sentences.chinese: 如果你有心讀它，我將寄上一份給你。

sentences.english: A bottle of water, iced tea or juice is a thoughtful extra for your house guests.
sentences.chinese: 一瓶水，冰茶或是果汁會讓你的客人覺得你特別有心。

sentences.english: It can be frustrating to design mobile services in this kind of environment.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的環境下設計移動服務會讓人感到有心無力。

definition: in the dark/in secret/on the sly/surreptitiously
no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
to do something to sb/to deal with/to cope/how?/to no avail
